At a distance of 140 kms from the capital city Bangalore. The village is situated just off (16kms) the national highway no.48 connecting Bangalore with Hassan/Mangalore.

Must visit the two enchanting temples, which mersmerise you with divine sculpture in stone. The two temples are Trikutachala housing the idols of Lord Lakshmi Narasimha, Lord Keshava & Lord gopalakrishna. The other temple is Dedicated to Lord Shiva.
